description.en:
Berryswapdex is a robust unique AMM system and a decentralized exchange platform built on the Binance smart chain network with seamless interoperability across the blockchain network and diverse contract systems.Berry is the native token of the BSE DEX, a core utility token with community participation. 

**OUR KEY FEATURES**
--Swap dex system
--IDO Launchpad system
--Staking pool
--Gaming platform 
--Farming pool
--cross-chain Bridge  system for seamless interoperability across the blockchain networks and diverse contract systems. 
--NFT market 
--Lottery platform 
--Universal Berry wallet and mobile app with an electronic card system..
We hope to bring revolutionary transformations in to the Dex systems and ensure the decentralisation of the crypto ecosystem..
